messages.content: You receive a json representation as well as a change description in order to crate a new json with the same format but with the requested changes. Despite of the changes leave the model exactly the same. Return nothing but a list of json elements.

This is the current version of a process model in json format: [{"id":1,"val":{"name":"Check open leads","actor":"Manager","suc":[2]}},{"id":2,"val":{"name":"Select top five leads","actor":"Manager","suc":[3]}},{"id":3,"val":{"name":"Call contact person","actor":"Sales Assistant","suc":[4]}},{"id":4,"val":{"name":"Call each customer","actor":"Sales Assistant","suc":[5]}},{"id":5,"val":{"decision":true,"name":"Interested","actor":"Sales Assistant","suc":[{"Yes":6},{"No":4}]}},{"id":6,"val":{"name":"Send note to Manager","actor":"Sales Assistant","suc":[7]}},{"id":7,"val":{"name":"Process lead","actor":"Manager","suc":[]}}]
Return a model in the same JSON format, which differs in the following changes: Delete the activity "Process lead".

[{"id":1,"val":{"name":"Check open leads","actor":"Manager","suc":[2]}},{"id":2,"val":{"name":"Select top five leads","actor":"Manager","suc":[3]}},{"id":3,"val":{"name":"Call contact person","actor":"Sales Assistant","suc":[4]}},{"id":4,"val":{"name":"Call each customer","actor":"Sales Assistant","suc":[5]}},{"id":5,"val":{"decision":true,"name":"Interested","actor":"Sales Assistant","suc":[{"Yes":6},{"No":4}]}},{"id":6,"val":{"name":"Send note to Manager","actor":"Sales Assistant","suc":[]}}]

You receive a json representation as well as a change description in order to crate a new json with the same format but with the requested changes. Despite of the changes leave the model exactly the same. Return nothing but a list of json elements.

This is the current version of a process model in json format: [{"id":1,"val":{"name":"Submit vacation request","actor":"Employee","suc":[2]}},{"id":2,"val":{"name":"Register requirement","actor":"","suc":[3]}},{"id":3,"val":{"name":"Receive request","actor":"Supervisor","suc":[4]}},{"id":4,"val":{"name":"Approve or reject request","decision":true,"actor":"Supervisor","suc":[{"approve":5},{"reject":6}]}},{"id":5,"val":{"name":"Generate notification","actor":"Supervisor","suc":[7]}},{"id":6,"val":{"name":"Return application","actor":"Supervisor","suc":[7]}},{"id":7,"val":{"name":"Complete management procedures","actor":"Human Resources Representative","suc":[]}}]
Return a model in the same JSON format, which differs in the following changes: After the task "Complete management procedures", insert the task "close case".

[{"id":1,"val":{"name":"Submit vacation request","actor":"Employee","suc":[2]}},{"id":2,"val":{"name":"Register requirement","actor":"","suc":[3]}},{"id":3,"val":{"name":"Receive request","actor":"Supervisor","suc":[4]}},{"id":4,"val":{"name":"Approve or reject request","decision":true,"actor":"Supervisor","suc":[{"approve":5},{"reject":6}]}},{"id":5,"val":{"name":"Generate notification","actor":"Supervisor","suc":[7]}},{"id":6,"val":{"name":"Return application","actor":"Supervisor","suc":[7]}},{"id":7,"val":{"name":"Complete management procedures","actor":"Human Resources Representative","suc":[8]}},{"id":8,"val":{"name":"Close case","actor":"Human Resources Representative","suc":[]}}]

This is the current version of a process model in json format: [{"id":1,"val":{"name":"Visit bank website","actor":"bank customer","suc":[2]}},{"id":2,"val":{"name":"Fill in personal data","actor":"bank customer","suc":[3]}},{"id":3,"val":{"name":"Generate PDF document","actor":"bank customer","suc":[4]}},{"id":4,"val":{"name":"Print PDF document","actor":"bank customer","suc":[5]}},{"id":5,"val":{"name":"Visit post office","actor":"bank customer","suc":[6]}},{"id":6,"val":{"name":"Check customer identity","actor":"post officer","suc":[7]}},{"id":7,"val":{"name":"Mail account to bank","actor":"post officer","suc":[8]}},{"id":8,"val":{"name":"Check customer data","actor":"bank officer","suc":[9]}},{"id":9,"val":{"decision":true,"name":"Accept or reject request","actor":"bank officer","suc":[{"Accept":10},{"Reject":11}]}},{"id":10,"val":{"name":"Mail account documents to customer","actor":"bank officer","suc":[]}},{"id":11,"val":{"name":"Mail letter of refusal","actor":"bank officer","suc":[]}}]
Return a model in the same JSON format, which differs in the following changes: Remove the first two tasks.

[{"id":1,"val":{"name":"Generate PDF document","actor":"bank customer","suc":[2]}},{"id":2,"val":{"name":"Print PDF document","actor":"bank customer","suc":[3]}},{"id":3,"val":{"name":"Visit post office","actor":"bank customer","suc":[4]}},{"id":4,"val":{"name":"Check customer identity","actor":"post officer","suc":[5]}},{"id":5,"val":{"name":"Mail account to bank","actor":"post officer","suc":[6]}},{"id":6,"val":{"name":"Check customer data","actor":"bank officer","suc":[7]}},{"id":7,"val":{"decision":true,"name":"Accept or reject request","actor":"bank officer","suc":[{"Accept":8},{"Reject":9}]}},{"id":8,"val":{"name":"Mail account documents to customer","actor":"bank officer","suc":[]}},{"id":9,"val":{"name":"Mail letter of refusal","actor":"bank officer","suc":[]}}]

This is the current version of a process model in json format: [{"id":1,"val":{"name":"Confirm payment received","actor":"","suc":[2,3]}},{"id":2,"val":{"name":"Request products from inventory","actor":"","suc":[4]}},{"id":3,"val":{"name":"Perform quality checks","actor":"","suc":[4]}},{"id":4,"val":{"name":"Attach shipping label to packaging","actor":"","suc":[]}}]

Return a model in the same JSON format, which differs in the following changes: When attaching the shipping label to the packaging is completed, examining your other orders for delivery overlaps needs to be done. When examining your other orders for delivery overlaps is completed, sending a confirmation email to the customer needs to be done. The process is now completed.

[{"id":1,"val":{"name":"Confirm payment received","actor":"","suc":[2,3]}},{"id":2,"val":{"name":"Request products from inventory","actor":"","suc":[4]}},{"id":3,"val":{"name":"Perform quality checks","actor":"","suc":[4]}},{"id":4,"val":{"name":"Attach shipping label to packaging","actor":"","suc":[5]}},{"id":5,"val":{"name":"Examine orders for delivery overlaps","actor":"","suc":[6]}},{"id":6,"val":{"name":"Send confirmation email to customer","actor":"","suc":[]}}]

This is the current version of a process model in json format: [{"id":1,"val":{"name":"Send to vendor accounting department","actor":"","suc":[2]}},{"id":2,"val":{"name":"Create receiving report","actor":"","suc":[3,4,5]}},{"id":3,"val":{"name":"Confirm documents amended","actor":"","suc":[6]}},{"id":4,"val":{"name":"Gather receiving report","actor":"","suc":[6]}},{"id":6,"val":{"name":"Stamp all documents","actor":"","suc":[]}}]

Return a model in the same JSON format, which differs in the following changes: In addition to confirming that the documents are amended and gathering the receiving report also double checking a three way match should be executed simultanuosly after creating the receiving report.

[{"id":1,"val":{"name":"Send to vendor accounting department","actor":"","suc":[2]}},{"id":2,"val":{"name":"Create receiving report","actor":"","suc":[3,4,5]}},{"id":3,"val":{"name":"Confirm documents amended","actor":"","suc":[6]}},{"id":4,"val":{"name":"Gather receiving report","actor":"","suc":[6]}},{"id":5,"val":{"name":"Double check three-way match","actor":"","suc":[6]}},{"id":6,"val":{"name":"Stamp all documents","actor":"","suc":[]}}]

You receive a json representation as well as a change description in order to crate a new json with the same format but with the requested changes. Despite of the changes leave the model exactly the same. Return nothing but a list of json elements.

This is the current version of a process model in json format: [{"id":1,"val":{"name":"Check files","actor":"","suc":[2]}},{"id":2,"val":{"decision":true,"name":"Are files missing?","actor":"","suc":[{"Yes":3},{"No":4}]}},{"id":3,"val":{"name":"Initiate search","actor":"","suc":[4]}},{"id":4,"val":{"name":"Track files","actor":"","suc":[5,6]}},{"id":5,"val":{"name":"Hand files to Associate","actor":"","suc":[7]}},{"id":6,"val":{"name":"Distribute Judges Lawlist","actor":"","suc":[7]}},{"id":7,"val":{"name":"Conduct directions hearings","actor":"","suc":[]}}]

Return a model in the same JSON format, which differs in the following changes: If files are missing, no search should be initiated. Instead the responsible employee is asked and then the responsible employee finds the files before the files are tracked.

[{"id":1,"val":{"name":"Check files","actor":"","suc":[2]}},{"id":2,"val":{"decision":true,"name":"Are files missing?","actor":"","suc":[{"Yes":3},{"No":4}]}},{"id":3,"val":{"name":"Ask responsible employee","actor":"","suc":[4]}},{"id":4,"val":{"name":"Find files","actor":"Responsible employee","suc":[5]}},{"id":5,"val":{"name":"Track files","actor":"","suc":[6,7]}},{"id":6,"val":{"name":"Hand files to Associate","actor":"","suc":[8]}},{"id":7,"val":{"name":"Distribute Judges Lawlist","actor":"","suc":[8]}},{"id":8,"val":{"name":"Conduct directions hearings","actor":"","suc":[]}}]

You receive a json representation as well as a change description in order to crate a new json with the same format but with the requested changes. Despite of the changes leave the model exactly the same. Return nothing but a list of json elements.
This is the current version of a process model in json format: [{"id":1,"val":{"name":"Check employee performance","actor":"Management","suc":[]}}]

Return a model in the same JSON format, which differs in the following changes: After checking the employee performance there is a decision. If the performance is less than 20%, the management suggests the employee’s dismissal to the human resources department (HR). Then, the HR dismisses the employee. If the employee performance is greater than 20% but less than 50%, the management will suggest training, which in turn is provided by HR. If the performance exceeds 75%, the management suggests the employee for reward. There may be either a financial reward or an other benefit. Regarding the latter, the management chooses an appropriate benefit. The financial reward is calculated and payed by the finance departement. Finally, the management announces the rewarded employee as employee of the month.

[{"id":1,"val":{"name":"Check employee performance","actor":"Management","suc":[2]}},{"id":2,"val":{"decision":true,"name":"Performance less than 20%?","actor":"Management","suc":[{"Yes":3},{"No":4}]}},{"id":3,"val":{"name":"Suggest employee's dismissal to HR","actor":"Management","suc":[5]}},{"id":4,"val":{"decision":true,"name":"Performance greater than 20% but less than 50%?","actor":"Management","suc":[{"Yes":6},{"No":7}]}},{"id":5,"val":{"name":"Dismiss employee","actor":"HR","suc":[]}},{"id":6,"val":{"name":"Suggest training to employee","actor":"Management","suc":[8]}},{"id":7,"val":{"decision":true,"name":"Performance exceeds 75%?","actor":"Management","suc":[{"Yes":9},{"No":""}]}},{"id":8,"val":{"name":"Provide training","actor":"HR","suc":[]}},{"id":9,"val":{"name":"Suggest reward","actor":"Management","suc":[10]}},{"id":10,"val":{"name":"Choose appropriate benefit","actor":"Management","suc":[11]}},{"id":11,"val":{"decision":true,"name":"Financial reward or other benefit?","actor":"Management","suc":[{"Financial reward":12},{"Other benefit":13}]}},{"id":12,"val":{"name":"Calculate financial reward","actor":"Finance department","suc":[14]}},{"id":13,"val":{"name":"Implement chosen benefit","actor":"Management","suc":[14]}},{"id":14,"val":{"name":"Announce rewarded employee as employee of the month","actor":"Management","suc":[]}}]

You receive a json representation as well as a change description in order to crate a new json with the same format but with the requested changes. Despite of the changes leave the model exactly the same. Return nothing but a list of json elements.

This is the current version of a process model in json format: [{"id":1,"val":{"name":"File copy for internal records","actor":"You","suc":[2]}},{"id":2,"val":{"name":"Create receiving report","actor":"You","suc":[3,4]}},{"id":3,"val":{"name":"Gather receiving report","actor":"You","suc":[5]}},{"id":4,"val":{"name":"Confirm documents have been amended","actor":"You","suc":[5]}},{"id":5,"val":{"name":"Create voucher for documents","actor":"You","suc":[]}}]

Return a model in the same JSON format, which differs in the following changes: After gathering the receiving report and before creating the voucher for the documents, the next tasks should be reporting errors to relevant team member, gathering the vendors invoice and doubling check a three-way match, they should be done in parallel.

[{"id":1,"val":{"name":"File copy for internal records","actor":"You","suc":[2]}},{"id":2,"val":{"name":"Create receiving report","actor":"You","suc":[3,4]}},{"id":3,"val":{"name":"Gather receiving report","actor":"You","suc":[5,6,7]}},{"id":4,"val":{"name":"Confirm documents have been amended","actor":"You","suc":[8]}},{"id":5,"val":{"name":"Report errors to relevant team member","actor":"You","suc":[8]}},{"id":6,"val":{"name":"Gather vendors invoice","actor":"You","suc":[8]}},{"id":7,"val":{"name":"Double check three-way match","actor":"You","suc":[8]}},{"id":8,"val":{"name":"Create voucher for documents","actor":"You","suc":[]}}]

You receive a json representation as well as a change description in order to crate a new json with the same format but with the requested changes. Despite of the changes leave the model exactly the same. Return nothing but a list of json elements.
This is the current version of a process model in json format: [{"id":1,"val":{"name":"Receive subsidiary order","actor":"SO: Angebot/Auftrag","suc":[]}}]

Return a model in the same JSON format, which differs in the following changes: After receiving the subsidiary order there follow some other tasks.The SO: Angebot/Auftrag prepares goods for shipment and then ships the goods, concurrently with preparing the goods and shipping them, the SO: Angebot/Auftrag prepares invoicing.
In case the customer is subsidiary and the subsidiary relationship is not yet modeled, SO: Address- management adds parent company as invoicing address, then the SO: Angebot/Auftrag create the invoice.
Otherwise if the customer is independent or the subsidiary relationship is already modeled in ERP, the SO: Angebot/Auftrag directly creates the invoice.
Finally, the SO: Angebot/Auftrag sends the invoice.

[{"id":1,"val":{"name":"Receive subsidiary order","actor":"SO: Angebot/Auftrag","suc":[2,4]}},{"id":2,"val":{"name":"Prepare goods for shipment","actor":"SO: Angebot/Auftrag","suc":[3]}},{"id":3,"val":{"name":"Ship the goods","actor":"SO: Angebot/Auftrag","suc":[5]}},{"id":4,"val":{"name":"Prepare invoicing","actor":"SO: Angebot/Auftrag","suc":[5]}},{"id":5,"val":{"decision":true,"name":"Check if customer is subsidiary and relationship is not modeled","actor":"","suc":[{"Yes":6},{"No":7}]}},{"id":6,"val":{"name":"Add parent company as invoicing address","actor":"SO: Address-management","suc":[7]}},{"id":7,"val":{"name":"Create the invoice","actor":"SO: Angebot/Auftrag","suc":[8]}},{"id":8,"val":{"name":"Send the invoice","actor":"SO: Angebot/Auftrag","suc":[]}}]

You receive a json representation as well as a change description in order to crate a new json with the same format but with the requested changes. Despite of the changes leave the model exactly the same. Return nothing but a list of json elements.

This is the current version of a process model in json format: [{"id":1,"val":{"name":"Fill out registration form","actor":"Visitor","suc":[2]}},{"id":2,"val":{"name":"Check availability of products","actor":"","suc":[]}}]

Return a model in the same JSON format, which differs in the following changes: After that the credit rating is checked. If the credit rating is higher than 9000 (according to Schufa) the registration is called unsuccessful. If not the interim customer dataset record is created. After this two sub-processes starts in parallel: Device provision and Register customer account at ISP nodes. Once these sub-processes are finished a welcome package is created and sent to the customer to alert them that the registration process was completed successfully.

[{"id":1,"val":{"name":"Fill out registration form","actor":"Visitor","suc":[2]}},{"id":2,"val":{"name":"Check availability of products","actor":"","suc":[3]}},{"id":3,"val":{"name":"Check credit rating","actor":"","suc":[4]}},{"id":4,"val":{"decision":true,"name":"Credit rating > 9000?","actor":"","suc":[{"Yes":5},{"No":6}]}},{"id":5,"val":{"name":"Call registration unsuccessful","actor":"","suc":[]}},{"id":6,"val":{"name":"Create interim customer dataset record","actor":"","suc":[7,8]}},{"id":7,"val":{"name":"Device provision","actor":"","suc":[9]}},{"id":8,"val":{"name":"Register customer account at ISP nodes","actor":"","suc":[9]}},{"id":9,"val":{"name":"Create welcome package","actor":"","suc":[10]}},{"id":10,"val":{"name":"Send welcome package to customer","actor":"","suc":[]}}]
